ai.summary: The Brandon Run Walk Route is a short, easy 2.9 km hike in the United Kingdom. Designed for casual walkers and families, the route offers gentle terrain and pleasant surroundings suitable for a relaxed outdoor outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily well-maintained paths with grassy sections and light woodland edges. Terrain is flat to gently rolling, with occasional muddy patches after rain and some exposed roots on uneven sections.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather before you go and dress accordingly. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a lightweight waterproof layer. Stay on marked paths, watch for cyclists on shared routes, and supervise children and pets. Carry a small first-aid kit, a charged mobile phone, and a map or GPS if you are unfamiliar with the area.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or light hiking boots
Map or offline GPS / smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) for the best conditions; winter walks are possible but can be muddy and darker.

seo.title: Brandon Run Walk Route - Easy 2.9 km hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Brandon Run Walk Route, a short and easy 2.9 km hike in the United Kingdom. Learn about terrain, safety tips, and gear to bring for a relaxed outdoor stroll.
